    • Method Detail

      • AESEncrypt

        public static java.lang.String AESEncrypt(AESKey aESKey,
                                          java.lang.String plainText,
                                          java.lang.String e,
                                          java.lang.String N)
                                   throws org.json.JSONException
        This function performs AES encryption.
        Parameters:
        aESKey - Object of AESKey containing 128 bit AES key.
        plainText - User data that is required to be encrypted.
        e - RSA encryption key.
        N - RSA N key.
        Returns:
        JSON encoded encrypted data.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - JSON parse error.

                                          java.lang.String plainText,
                                          org.json.JSONObject rSAKeys)
                                   throws org.json.JSONException
        This function performs AES encryption.
        Parameters:
        aESKey - Object of AESKey containing 128 bit AES key.
        plainText - User data that is required to be encrypted.
        rSAKeys - JSON encoded RSA key.
        Returns:

        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - JSON parse error.

      • AESEncrypt

        public static java.lang.String AESEncrypt(AESKey aESKey,
                                          java.lang.String plainText,
                                          java.lang.Object customEncryptionClass)
                                   throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                          org.json.JSONException
        This function performs AES encryption.
        Parameters:
        aESKey - Object of AESKey containing 128 bit AES key.
        plainText - User data that is required to be encrypted.
        customEncryptionClass - Object of class that implements CustomEncryption.
        Returns:
        JSON encoded encrypted data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If customEncryptionClass doesn't implement Interface CustomEncryption then an error is thrown.
        org.json.JSONException - JSON parse error.
